message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I really appreciate it, but I'm hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
I understand that you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $115.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  However, $115 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $110.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $112.50.
